25e8c2e1a0e5089761cbbb33f443de86 --> [Guillaume Faury] We delivered 566 aircraft in 2020, including around 150 aircraft for which we were using the so-called e-Deliveries.

aa18d4f428326d9b5e2cd199754d7bb2 --> At group level, our backlog in value decreased to €373 billion in 2020.

3fb3232928551795c1c9996f856634a6 --> After the full finalization of our significant rollover campaign, which addressed around $40 billion of hedges

e88ee7be85f691d2df088d7f31154e55 --> Revenues mainly reflect lower deliveries with a decrease of 297 aircraft year-on-year, of which 206 single-aisle and 91 wide-bodies.

2d47ed9d2945cd637ea0497b865bcd72 --> Dominik Asam - "Our fiscal year 2020 revenues decreased to around €50 billion, down 29% year-on-year, driven by the difficult market environment impacting our commercial aircraft business as we delivered about 34% fewer aircraft year-on-year."

433f54a5acc69ce6dbbf2df4ac04df8f --> Guillaume Faury - Our total hedging portfolio in U.S. dollar stands at $81 billion with an average hedge rate of $1.26.

433f54a5acc69ce6dbbf2df4ac04df8f --> Guillaume Faury - Customer financing contributed positively, approximately €0.1 billion.

109a88b76f11068cef5f3bac571374f5 --> Guillaume Faury - In 2020, revenues grew by 4.1%.

a28334b77aeeaddffbd682079e1ce33f --> Benjamin Heelan: Delivered €2.6 million in the second half of 2020.

da494e852f727e71bf4a38351250503c --> The funding percentage of aircraft delivered by funding export -- funding through Export Credit Agencies has increased from 2% to 10%.

93a29b5b2eac21267453d6643763f29e --> Dominik Asam[Now the provision that's still out there for that is €1.2 billion.]

110640422312cc32b904842ee62bd1cd --> Andrew Gollan [So first one is on the order book valuation. So it's down about €100 billion.]

78bb5d0bddeba141a73cde1462a1da92 --> Dominik Asam: "The depreciation of the U.S. dollar from the opening balance sheet to the closing balance sheet, which was 9%."

78bb5d0bddeba141a73cde1462a1da92 --> Dominik Asam: "Representing about €35 billion."

6a390df847274ec0a48f8c15a526893c --> Dominik Asam: "But I think last year, we said that we have a couple of mid-triple-digit million for a couple of years and tapering off over the following couple of years. And my point was, this is unchanged. This is the same story."

d4a3bec5b15c8546c3c378d33b537e4d --> Our net cash position has improved to €5.6 billion as end of March, and our liquidity position remained strong and stood at €34.8 billion.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury During the quarter, we further adjusted the phasing of our hedges by implementing $4.8 billion of rollovers.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury We also implemented $4.6 billion of forwards at a rate of $1.22, and $1.2 billion of hedges were disqualified.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury Our gross cash flow from operations of €0.6 billion mainly reflects our EBIT adjusted and includes a €0.3 billion provision consumption related to the restructuring plan.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury Our working capital has decreased by €1 billion and includes a strong phasing impact from working capital also in our divisions.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury Year-to-date, the A400M continued to weigh on our free cash flow before M&A, but less so than in Q1 2020.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury Q1 CapEx was around minus €0.5 billion, stable versus Q1 2020.

3bf20544a55d4467970feba25ee90f2a --> Guillaume Faury Free cash flow reported was €1.2 billion, M&A activities accounted for €11 million, and customer financing represented an outflow of only minus €31 million.

6353773c4c612ca0af3c0f2743ee203b --> The resulting net income is €2.6 billion with earnings per share reported of €3.36.

5ea9382daf843e407d59d8a7977fe635 --> M&A activities accounted for only minus €14 million.

5ea9382daf843e407d59d8a7977fe635 --> Our net cash position has improved to €6.7 billion as of the end of September.

5ea9382daf843e407d59d8a7977fe635 --> Our liquidity position remained strong and stood at €27.7 billion.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> The 9 months 2021 EBIT reported was also €3.4 billion.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> The level of EBIT adjustments was a net positive of €0.1 billion in total.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> €190 million related to the A380 program, of which €45 million booked in Q3.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> Minus €165 million negative impact from foreign exchange mismatch and balance sheet revaluation, of which only €5 million in Q3.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> Plus €43 million of other adjustments, including compliance costs, of which minus €6 million in Q3.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> Earnings per share reported includes minus €172 million of financial results.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> The net interest result of minus €233 million, partly offset by plus €63 million related to Dassault Aviation.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> The tax rate on the core business is around 27%.

338492f6bc5c9febc8ff948550215b41 --> The effective tax rate on net income is only 21%.

fa90d2367a294a9673faed4671e260ec --> Finally, let me remind you that the 9 months 2020 EBIT adjusted included €1 billion of charges due to impairments and write-offs triggered by COVID-19.

fa90d2367a294a9673faed4671e260ec --> The EBIT adjusted increased by more than 30% versus last year, versus the 9 months 2020, to €314 million this year.

1fe062bd8a051b785bb56625137ed994 --> H1 EBIT adjusted was at minus €0.9 billion, driven by commercial aircraft deliveries, which were 193 aircraft lower year-on-year.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> Our H1 earnings per share adjusted stand at a loss of €1.01 per share, using an average of 783 million shares.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> H1 2020 EBIT reported was minus €1.6 billion.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> The level of EBIT adjustments totaled a negative €614 million and included minus €332 million related to the A380 program costs, of which minus €299 million booked in Q2; minus €165 million impact from foreign exchange and balance sheet revaluation, of which 31 – minus €31 million in Q2; minus €117 million of other costs, including compliance costs, of which minus €82 million in Q2.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> Earnings per share reported include minus €429 million of financial results.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> It mainly reflects a net €212 million negative related to Dassault Aviation as well as the impairment of a loan to OneWeb recorded in Q1 for an amount of minus €136 million.

608cede1cfb02bcdff699556c5f0c113 --> The effective tax rate on net loss is 3%, impacted by impairments in certain tax jurisdictions and on certain investments.

0b8a989936fe3fa9634ba25b14a85bdb --> The resulting net loss is minus €1.919 billion.

0b8a989936fe3fa9634ba25b14a85bdb --> Loss per share reported was minus €2.45.

0b8a989936fe3fa9634ba25b14a85bdb --> $1.8 billion of hedges has been disqualified in H1 with maturity dates mainly from 2022 and beyond, resulting in a negative impact to financial results of approximately €0.1 billion.

0b8a989936fe3fa9634ba25b14a85bdb --> We paid the €3.6 billion penalty in Q1 2020.

69ee7510ca65ce078dbfe28a7d8450e7 --> [Guillaume Faury] €0.9 billion of COVID-19-related charges, including €0.1 billion in R&D.

9dceee3abf06e64ac87a65aa4805f00c --> M&A activities accounted for €0.5 billion negative mainly related to the acquisition of Bombardier's remaining stake in ACLP for about $0.5 billion.
